post:
YDGH hasn't went anywhere and we have a little bit of stock that we would like to get rid of before we launch our dallas product.

We are offering our good friend's at LET the chance to receive 30% off any of our openvz VPS products for the first month with promotion code **LEB30**, we hope you enjoy our LET only offer. Here is an example of our VPS1 product @ $5.00  a month ($3.50 with promo code for first month).

VPS1
2 CPU Cores
512MB Dedicated Ram / 1024MB Burst Ram
30GB Disk Space
1000GB Bandwidth
1 Dedicated IPv4 Address included, 8 Max
100mbit port
SolusVM Control Panel

[yourdomaingoeshere.com/openvz.php](http://www.yourdomaingoeshere.com/openvz.php)
Please use promotion code LEB30 to get the discounted price at checkout.

Servers are located in Los Angeles and Chicago. You can use the following IP addresses for ping/traceroute results

Chicago - 216.231.133.34
Los Angeles - 173.254.213.226
